title: President Rajapaksa attends Zayed Future Energy Prize Awards Ceremony-2014
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – Sri Lanka President Mahinda Rajapaksa who arrived at the Abu Dhabi Capital of the United Arab Emirates (UAE) on a one-day state visit has attended the opening ceremony of the 7th World Future Energy Summit (WFES) and Zayed Future Energy Prize Awards Ceremony-2014 last evening (20 January) at the Abu…
